name: SpringHill Suites Centreville Chantilly

reviews.text: We stayed three nights over the Thanksgiving weekend and enjoyed this hotel for three reasons:
reviews.title: worked for us

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Happy Guy- no complaints

likes.disliked: — Studio room is marketed as a suite

reviews.title: Excellent family hotel
reviews.text: 2) had room for three, albeit snug

reviews.title: Just back from another great stay..
reviews.text: 3) something to eat for breakfast, but could have been better
The hotel staff was helpful and friendly, with super fast check-in.

aka: Springhill Suites Centreville Manassas Hotel Centreville
description: Visit SpringHill Suites Centreville Chantilly located near Dulles Expo Center, Washington Dulles International Airport and several shopping centers offering dining and shopping options. Enjoy new healthy and hot breakfast options, complimentary high-speed Internet access, affordable day passes to an adjacent 24 hour fitness center.
